```{r, message=FALSE, echo=FALSE}
Cal_Pretable<-read.csv2("~/Project_Master/Test_Rep/Output/Calibration/Output_LN_SED/Edited Data/Soil_Solution_All2.csv", header=TRUE)
Cal_Pretable$group_id<-as.character(Cal_Pretable$group_id)
Cal_Pretable$Date<-as.Date(as.character(Cal_Pretable$Date))

#Change names of columns here
#Write function for pH
source("~/Project_Master/Test_Rep/Code/Functions/Tabulator.R")

SS_Yr_Avg<-Tab_Func_SS(Cal_Pretable)


SS_Yr_Avg %>% mutate_if(is.numeric, format, digits=2,nsmall = 0) %>%
  kbl(caption = "Table 1: Average Annual Soil Solution Concentration", col.names=c("Soil Layer", "Year","Month", "Ca", "Mg", "K", "NO3", "NH4", "SO4", "Cl", "PO4", "DOC", "Al", "Si", "H+", "pH", "R", "HR")) %>%t(.)%>% kable_styling() 
 
```
